About the Company: Quintegra Solutions Ltd delivers a full range of application development, testing, enterprise solutions, business process consulting, systems integration and staffing services as well as pre-defined solution frameworks. The compnay provides solutions to following industries:Banking & Financial Services,Healthcare ,Education and Training,Engineering Services,Logistics and Telecom.The services offered by the company includes Application Management,Product Engineering,SAP,Testing & Validation,Technology Consulting and Products for education & training, healthcare and non-life insurance.
